Professional Website Designer & Developer
Ruben Gutierrez

Hello! My name is Ruben Gutierrez and I am a freelance website designer in La Habra, California

How I Got Started Working On Computers

My intrest in computers began when I recieved my first computer for Christmans at 10. When I wasn't taking it apart and putting it back I was researching ways to make it go faster.

Made My First Money Because of Windows XP

While it wasn't the most reliable operating system Windows XP ruled the early 2000's. Due to ecruity problems in the software that allowed for 3rd party downloads to make changes to the system a lot of people found themselves having to regularly take their comput

What I Can Do

These are some of the skills I've developed over time sitting infront of a computer for hours.

Website Development

I am experienced in using these tools, WordPress, static site generators, databases, as well as front-end technologies like JavaScript, HTML, and CSS

Website Design

Using Programs Like Figma and Adobe XD I can create unique website designs that help people stand out.

Images & Illustrations

Images and illustrations are essential for anyone looking to get some attention online, with the proper input I can help bring your products, services, and ideas to life. Using design tools like Photoshop and Illustrator I help the people I work with to convey the exact message and feeling they want they're customer to get.

Wilingsness & Dedication

I can create vector art and modify existing ones using vector based software like Adobe Illustrator and Inkscape
